articles.author: Justin Harp
articles.title: Marvel's Cate Blanchett got head injury in chainsaw accident - digitalspy.com
articles.description: But she swears it wasn't "very, very exciting".
articles.content:
Marvel Cinematic Universe star Cate Blanchett is "fine" after escaping an encounter with a chainsaw.
Though the two-time Academy Award winner may have had the power to destroy Asgard as the death go… [+2631 chars]

articles.title: David Oyelowo Says The Academy Punished 'Selma' Cast For Protesting Eric Garner's Death - ET Canada
articles.description: As the world continues to protest the death of George Floyd, David Oyelowo is speaking out about the backlash he and the cast of "Selma" received for protest...
